meanings.definition: A form of theatrical entertainment consisting of a series of short sketches, songs, and dances
meanings.sent1: The school play featured lively revues that made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy watching revues at the theater because they are entertaining and fun.
meanings.sent3: The revues at the comedy show had the audience in stitches with their hilarious skits.
meanings.sent4: Her life felt like a series of revues, each scene more dramatic than the last.
meanings.sent5: The colorful costumes and energetic performances in the revues left a lasting impression on the audience.

meanings.definition: A periodical publication containing articles and illustrations, often on a particular subject or aimed at a particular audience.
meanings.sent1: I picked up a fashion revues to read about the latest trends.
meanings.sent2: Her favorite revues focus on travel destinations and adventure stories.
meanings.sent3: The revues about gardening had beautiful illustrations of blooming flowers.
meanings.sent4: In a world of words, her mind was a revues of colorful images and stories.
meanings.sent5: The revues on wildlife conservation inspired many readers to take action and protect the environment.
